chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem:
Package was supposed to be delivered according to the email. It's not at my neighbor's place either. Hope it wasn't left in front of the door, as there are many people walking by here. Please clarify where it is or was dropped off.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
